Package controller

Class PaymentController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.PaymentController
  • public class PaymentController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class allows the user to make payment for their order. There is only one option of payment for regular client: payment with credit card. There are there options of payment for a subscribed client: payment with credit card, payment with E-Krut app, a deferred payment. If the payment was successful, the client will get back to their home page. The client can go back from the window this class represents to the window "Menu". Also from the window this class represents, the client can exit the client side of the system altogether.

      • updateInvatory

        public void updateInvatory​(java.util.ArrayList<Cart> arrCart)
        This method updates the inventory of the facility from which the client made their order according to the order - reduces the products purchased from the inventory.
        Parameters:
        arrCart -

      • addOrderDetailsToDB

        public void addOrderDetailsToDB​(java.lang.String payment)
        This method adds all the details about the order to the "orders" table in the data base. These details include: the products purchased, the total price of the order, the type of payment that was made, the type of order (on site / pick up late / delivery), the facility from which the order was made, etc.
        Parameters:
        payment -

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        This method initializes the combo boxes in the window, from which the user can choose the expiration date on their credit card.

      • initArrCart

        public void initArrCart​(java.util.ArrayList<Cart> arr)
        Parameters:
        arr - - set the array that represents the cart to this value

      • getTotalPrice

        public java.lang.String[] getTotalPrice()
        Returns:
        the total price of the entire order

      • setTotalPrice

        public void setTotalPrice​(java.lang.String[] totalPrice)
        Parameters:
        totalPrice - - set the total price of the entire order to this value

      • setFields

        public void setFields​(java.lang.String nameOnCard,
                      java.lang.String creditCard,
                      java.lang.String expirationDate,
                      java.lang.String cvv)
        This method sets automatically the fields in the "payment with credit card" section to the values that stored in the data base for the client. The client can change the values set automatically if they want to pay with a different card.
        Parameters:
        nameOnCard - - the name of the card holder
        creditCard - - the credit card number
        expirationDate - - the expiration date of the credit card
        cvv - - the security number at the back of the card

      • setDetailsUserForDelivery

        public void setDetailsUserForDelivery​(java.lang.String address,
                                      java.lang.String phone)
        This method sets the details needed for an order for delivery
        Parameters:
        address - - the address that the client entered (where to send the order to)
        phone - - the clients phone number

      • setTimer

        public void setTimer​(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage)
        This method sets a timer so that if the user doesn't use the system for more than 5 minutes, it will automatically close
